column2: ERSST.v4 is developped based on v3b after revisions of 11 parameters using updated data sets and advanced knowledge of ERSST analysis
This data can be used to determine and plot average Ocean temperatures
No constraints on data access or use

column3: Latitude: Uniform grid from -88 to 88 by 2
column4: Longitude: Uniform grid from 0 to 358 by 2
column5: Altitude: Depth of sea surface temperature measurements
